Alternate Contact: Sarah Semeniuk, Recreation Technician; Phone: 250.469.8414; Email: ssemeniuk@kelowna.ca
Volunteer Coordinator: Heather Crawford, Recreation Technician; Phone: 250.469.8467; Email: hcrawford@kelowna.ca
Service Details: - Distributes Recreational Opportunities Coupons through agencies in the community for use by individuals and families in financial need to assist them in accessing facilities and programs- May be used for admission to Parkinson Recreation Centre Aquatic and Fitness Classes, Drop-in Basketball, Public Skating and Babysitting services- Recreation opportunities funding is available for a discount on membership and program registration up to $50
Hours: Access to Recreation Office Hours:  Tue,Thu: 10:00am -1:00pm
How to Apply: Clients need to go through a social agency to access coupons
Address & Map: 1800 Parkinson WayKelowna, BC     V1Y 4P9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible ; Accessible by public transit, access friendly facility, wheel chair accessible, disabled parking, automatic doors, access friendly washrooms, hydraulic pool lift for main pool, ramp entry to small pool, access friendly fitness centre
Former Name: Recreation, Parks and Cultural Services, Active Communities
